item.title: Reviews
item.description: Reviews If you would like to predict how good your stay at Hawley Farm will be without any perceived marketing bias of this website, then please look at our Reviews on Trip Advisor by clicking one of: Cider Press, Wagon House or Stables. Note however that it is beneficial for you to book direct, through this website. Reviews on Booking.com. Note however that it is beneficial to book direct, through this website.
